title: The Flaming Lips DVD 5.1 -  At War With the Mystics
description:
The Flaming Lips: At War with the Mystics 5.1 (DVD AUDIO)
(Dolby Digital)

This the DVD from the 2 disk edition of Mystics in the convenient ISO format. Just bring up your favorite burning software, (mines nero) and burn away. If you enjoy the album I HIGHLY RECOMMEND buying this and all of their other 5.1 albums (I also have "The Soft Bulletin" and "Yoshimi Battles the Pink Robots")

Enjoy!!

I cannot say enough good things about this album. If you haven&#039;t heard the Flaming Lips in 5.1 you have not really heard the Flaming Lips. 







At War with the Mystics 5.1

Like The Soft Bulletin and Yoshimi, At War with the Mystics was released as a special edition 5.1 CD+DVD-Audio mix on October 24, 2006. It is accompanied with studio outtakes, videos and exclusive radio sessions.
